website_summaries.verdict: On the pricier side. Wireless connectivity is one of this camera's greatest strengths.
cons: A more simplistic product than other contenders on our list

customer_reviews.title: Great for distance teaching
customer_reviews.text: Good costs to performance ratio. Easy to use (though does not use USB-C). The picture quality depends on the lighting, but that can be adjusted quickly. With adjustment, pencil written on white paper is very readable. I use it for long-distance office hours. I am still getting an IPad to be able to better draw, but in the mean-time, this works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. E. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a straightforward inexpensive document camera. It requires software to use, so you can't just plug it in and go. The software is free, and only available via download, but at least you don't have to keep track of the disk. The software is a little hokey, but has a few decent features (snapshots, zoom, autofocus) The camera only requires a USB cable (included) so you don't have to run a separate power cord. I used it on a Mac and it worked well enough. It is no way compares to a commercial document camera, but those cost 10x more. For the price, its a decent value.
customer_reviews.author: chitt44

customer_reviews.title: Awesome document camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good asset to our classroom. Easy to use. Easy to connect. Definitely would recommend to anyone...

product_meta.title: Lumens DC120 Ladibug Document Camera
product_meta.description: The Lumens DC-120 Document Camera is a lightweight portable document camera. It is easy to set up, and connects directly to your computer through a USB cable. It is a plug and play document camera that can be connected to your computer for installation and power. The USB can be connected to interactive whiteboards to provide seamless integration. The USB provides speed up to 480 Mbps, ensuring fast transfer of data. The Lumens DC-120 displays high resolution crystal clear images, has a built in microphone and built in lamp. It has 4 x digital zoom so you can easily capture all the details. You don't need to buy extra accessories to record streaming videos. All the hardware you need is provided! It is a Great Value for your money. The Flexible Gooseneck Design allows the lens and lamp heads to independently rotate 360 degrees, capturing images at any angle. The camera can be pointed toward a student to project his face onto a screen as he makes his presentation to the class. Comes with Ladibug Software for the PC and Macintosh platforms, which offers full-screen overlaying capabilities for annotating with a PS/2 mouse or smart board, and unlimited capture of JPEG images to a computer. True XGA output of 1024 x 768, SXGA output of 1280 x 960, UXGA output of 1600 x 1200. The light source is separate from camera head. Comes with Zoom Capacity of 4x digital zoom. Has Image freeze feature. Easy slide show capability from remote or software. Active VGA pass through. Comes with composite video output. Comes with full screen software with control capability. Comes with internal power supply. Comes with Kensington security slot and mounting screws. Comes with a 5-Year Warranty that is the most comprehensive in the industry.
